timeAnchors.sourceText: The primary analysis will be performed on the randomised (intention to treat) set. It is planned that approximately 2850 patients will be randomised to accumulate approximately 841 confirmed primary events

repetitions.sourceText: From Visit 8 and onwards, on-site visits will be scheduled every 24 weeks until end of trial.

repetitions.exitCondition: If the trial continues beyond 148 weeks, visits are to be repeated with same intervals as from week 64 and onwards.
repetitions.sourceText: If the trial continues beyond 148 weeks, visits are to be repeated with same intervals as from week 64 and onwards.
The screening procedures can be done on different days within the time window -28 to -4
All patients will have a follow up visit 30 days following regular or premature completion of the treatment period.

traversalConstraints.sourceText: [{'condition': 'If subject terminates treatment early', 'path': ['EOT_VISIT', 'FOLLOW_UP_VISIT']}, {'condition': 'If LVEF not measured within 6 months prior to Visit 1', 'path': ['LVEF_MEASUREMENT_AFTER_CONSENT', 'VISIT_2']}]

executionTypes.rationale: EPISODE signals: 2; SINGLE signals: 5; RECURRING signals: 1
LVEF must be documented in an official report prior to randomization, either as a historical value within 6 months or a one-time measurement after consent.
Elevated NT-proBNP is assessed at Visit 1 (screening) to determine eligibility based on specific ejection fraction thresholds.
HF medical therapy must be stable for at least 1 week prior to Visit 1 and throughout the screening period until Visit 2.

The trial duration and sample size are conditional; if blinded data suggests slow accrual, recruitment may be extended or the number of patients increased until the target number of events is reached.

endpointAlgorithms.name: Primary: Composite of CV Death or HHF
endpointAlgorithms.successCriteria: Statistically significant increase in time to first event vs placebo
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: The composite primary endpoint for this trial is the time to first event of adjudicated CV death or adjudicated HHF in patients with HFrEF.

endpointAlgorithms.name: Key Secondary: Recurrent HHF
endpointAlgorithms.successCriteria: Reduction in total (first and recurrent) HHF events
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: Occurrence of adjudicated HHF (first and recurrent)

endpointAlgorithms.name: Key Secondary: eGFR Slope
endpointAlgorithms.successCriteria: Reduction in the rate of eGFR decline
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: eGFR (CKD-EPI)cr slope of change from baseline

endpointAlgorithms.name: Secondary: Renal Composite Endpoint
endpointAlgorithms.algorithm: min(dialysis_date, transplant_date, date_of_sustained_reduction_eGFR >= 40%, date_of_sustained_eGFR < 15 [if baseline >= 30] OR < 10 [if baseline < 30])
endpointAlgorithms.successCriteria: Increase in time to first renal event
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: Time to first occurrence of chronic dialysis or renal transplant or sustained reduction of ≥40% eGFR (CKD-EPI)cr or sustained eGFR (CKD-EPI)cr <15 mL/min/1.73 m2 for patients with baseline eGFR ≥30 mL

endpointAlgorithms.name: Secondary: KCCQ Clinical Summary Score
endpointAlgorithms.successCriteria: Improvement in KCCQ clinical summary score at week 52
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: Change from baseline in clinical summary score (HF symptoms and physical limitations domains) of the KCCQ at week 52

derivedVariables.name: Time to first event of adjudicated CV death or adjudicated HHF
derivedVariables.derivationRule: min(date of first adjudicated CV death, date of first adjudicated HHF) - randomization date
derivedVariables.analysisWindow: From randomization until 841 confirmed primary outcome events occur trial-wide
derivedVariables.imputationRule: Censoring at last contact if no event occurs

derivedVariables.name: eGFR (CKD-EPI)cr slope of change from baseline
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Rate of change in eGFR over time calculated via CKD-EPI formula
derivedVariables.baselineDefinition: eGFR at Visit 1 or last value prior to treatment
derivedVariables.imputationRule: Alpha split (0.001) for analysis; specific longitudinal model details not in snippet

derivedVariables.name: Time to first occurrence of renal composite endpoint
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Time to first of: chronic dialysis, renal transplant, sustained reduction of ≥40% eGFR, or sustained eGFR <15 (or <10 if baseline <30) mL/min/1.73 m2
derivedVariables.baselineDefinition: eGFR at baseline (thresholds of 30 mL/min/1.73 m2 used for categorization)

derivedVariables.name: Change from baseline in KCCQ clinical summary score at week 52
derivedVariables.baselineDefinition: Last non-missing score prior to randomization

derivedVariables.name: Time to onset of diabetes mellitus in patients with pre-DM
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Time from randomization to first diagnosis of DM in the subgroup with pre-DM at baseline

derivedVariables.name: Occurrence of adjudicated HHF (first and recurrent)
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Count of all confirmed HHF events per patient
